title: Genotype
description: Genotypes and their genomic components.  references allele.json

primaryId.description: The prefixed primary (MOD) ID for an entity. For internal AGR use, e.g. FB:FBgn0003301, MGI:87917.

taxonId.description: The taxonId for the species of the genotype entity.

genotypeComponents.description: Collection of genomic components that make up a genotype, ie: 'allele', each with a zygosity

sequenceTargetingReagentIDs.description: Collection of sequence targeting reagent components that make up a genotype.

backgroundIDs.description: Collection of background components that make up a genotype.
